Title: Metro App Toolkit
Description:
The Metro App Toolkit provides the developer community with key components and functionality that are commonly used in Metro Apps for WindowsPhone, Windows8 and the web, including Networking! 

Toolkit releases include samples & docs.

From the community, for the community.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The Metro App Toolkit provides the developer community with key components and functionality that are commonly used in Metro Apps for WindowsPhone, Windows8 and the web, including Networking!

Toolkit releases include samples & docs.

From the community, for the community.



This project is still in development. We are a couple weeks behind in making everything available. Thanks for your patience and support!

Metro App Toolkit

October 2012
  • Download on NuGet
  • Release notes

Blogs & Tweets

Executive Designer, Developer: Richard Nalezynski
Evangelists: Jim O'Neil
User Groups, Influencers: Brian Peek, Andy Beaulieu

Open Source

  1. Any source code that is sent through the CodePlex project (through comments, patches, or items in the Issue Tracker) will be considered for addition in future releases; but may not be included. However, we do welcome all feedback.
  2. Please review the Quality Bands for information on the support and quality level of the toolkit components.
  3. It's preferred that you reference the toolkit in your apps, controls, and products, giving credit when and where it is due. Lastly - have fun!
